post:
Hello VPSBoard Members! 

We at Skyline Networks, Currently Provide :

- KVM & OpenVZ VPS

- SSD Shared Hosting & HDD Shared Hosting

- Reverse Proxies [HTTP & TCP] 

- WHMCS Licenses. [Open a ticket if interested!]



Why Skyline Networks?

Skyline Networks has been providing high performing and cheap web hosting solutions since early this year. Over time we have built up experience and improved a lot of our services and also support response times, we never stop improving we want to achieve the most satisfaction for our customers and achieve 100% up time on all our services. As said early on our primary focus is customer satisfaction, solid up time, keeping our servers upgraded to the latest hardware and make sure we don't come across any issues. We never oversell our services and make sure that all our customers get the rock solid hosting experience. Sometimes hosting come across disk failure and loss client data, we at Skyline Networks strive to make sure that never happens we understand how important your data is to you therefore on all our servers we ensure we have Raid10 Hardware. 


Skyline Networks KVM VPS Hosting Features:

  • - Raid-10 Hardware
  • - DDR3 ECC Ram
  • - Basic DDOS Protection
  • - Expert Support Team
  • - Premium Bandwidth 
  • - 100% Satisfaction
  • - 99.9% Uptime Guarantee.
  • - 24x7 Ticket/email support and limited live support.
  • - Located in New York

FAQ:

Does the price ever increase?
No it will never increase the price is locked in for the life of the account.

What payments methods do you accept?
Paypal / Credit Card

How soon will my account be ready?
All of new order setup instantly after payment. If your account does not setup instantly please submit a ticket to sales department.

Any Content Restrictions?
Terms Of Services  - https://www.skylinen...OS-skyline.html

Acceptable Use Policy - https://www.skylinen...le-skyline.html

Privacy Policy - https://www.skylinen...acy-Policy.html

What is your SLA guarantee?
Our SLA  guarantee is 99% uptime, however if your service is down due to network failure or power cuts, we do offer account credit or extra days of service.


Where are the servers located?
Our server is Located Buffalo,  New York our Datacenter is ColoCrossing.

Do you have a money back guarantee?
We currently do not give refunds as stated in our TOS, however if the Uptime is below our SLA we will refund you.
